title: English
description: Enhance your reading, writing, and communication skills. Build a strong foundation in language and literature.

title: Urdu
description: Explore the richness of Urdu literature and improve your proficiency in reading and writing. Learn the cultural significance of the language.

title: Mathematics
description: Develop logical reasoning and problem-solving skills. Master concepts from basic arithmetic to advanced algebra and geometry.

title: Information Technology
description: Learn about the latest technology trends and coding practices. Gain practical skills in software and hardware applications.

title: Arts
description: Unleash your creativity through painting, sculpture, and digital art. Explore various mediums to express your artistic vision.

title: Sports
description: Improve physical fitness, teamwork, and sportsmanship. Participate in activities ranging from soccer to gymnastics.
